project.name: deploy-luciad
project.description:
This Ant project will upload the Lightspeed libraries to a Maven repository. At least Ant 1.9.1 is required. The Maven antlib must be available to Ant (either in Ant's lib directory, the CLASSPATH environment variable or supplied via -lib).
Unless set via the command line, the script will ask for the repository URL, username and password. HTTP and file protocols are supported by default. For other protocols, see http://maven.apache.org/wagon/

target.name: libs:deploy:luciad
target.description: Deploy Luciad-custom builds of third-party libraries

target.name: deploy
target.description: Deploy all libraries and resources in this release to your Maven repository

echo.message: ===== The following POMs were successfully deployed =====
===== The following POMs failed to deploy =====

fail.message: Some POMs could not be deployed. Check the list above and verify that this is expected (your repository may not allow overwrites).

target.name: setup:private
target.echo: WARNING: you are about to skip deployment of publicly available libraries. You should probably call the deploy target instead of deploy:private. If you continue, Luciad will not provide support relating to missing or invalid dependencies.
